stripped_text: When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time). trash: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.
text:
When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time).
[trash]: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.
title: Street Peddler
